name: Achtung!
description:
Go tread-to-tread with your friends and and see who the ultimate Panzer Ace is!

- 4-way, drop-in, local multiplayer. Keyboard and controller support. Just plug and play.

- Panthers and Tigers and Wolverines, oh my! 10 types of World War 2 armored fighting vehicle: all with different strengths and weaknesses.

- Authentic armour system. Shots bounce or hit depending on distance and velocity. Speed, positioning and skill are needed to win.

- AI Bots for solo play, co-operative, or to just even-the-odds.

- Cooperative map-maker mode. Build a battlefield with your friends. (Coming soon).
